downloadDescription: Enabling managed class library developers throughout the world to easily create accurate, informative documentation with a common look and feel.
detailsSection:
Sandcastle produces accurate, MSDN style, comprehensive documentation by reflecting over the source assemblies and optionally integrating XML Documentation Comments. Sandcastle has the following key features:

  • Works with or without authored comments

  • Supports Generics and .NET Framework 2.0

  • Sandcastle has 2 main components (MrefBuilder and Build Assembler)

  • MrefBuilder generates reflection xml file for Build Assembler

  • Build Assembler includes syntax generation, transformation..etc

  • Sandcastle is used internally to build .Net Framework documentation
systemRequirementsSection:
Required Software:
  • Microsoft .NET Framework Version 2.0, available here

  • HTML Help Workshop available here
Optional Software:
  • Visual Studio 2005

  • MS Help Compiler from VS SDK here
installInstructionSection:
1. Uninstall previous versions of Sandcastle.
2. Click on the "Download" button above to install Sandcastle.
3. After installing Sandcastle, follow the steps here to create a sample CHM or HxS build.
4. Visit Sandcastle blog for the release notes and latest information.

Note: Installing VS SDK after installing Sandcastle will cause Sandcastle not to work properly as VS SDK installer updates both the PATH and DXROOT environment variables in the registry
additionalInformationSection: Please post all Sandcastle related questions and discussions at http://forums.microsoft.com/MSDN/ShowForum.aspx?ForumID=66&SiteID=1. Please send you bugs and feature requests to sandchlp@microsoft.com

relatedResourcesSection.title: create CHM or HxS build using Sandcastle
